descriptions.en: A single kick from a Quaquaval can send a truck rolling. This Pokémon uses its powerful legs to perform striking dances from far-off lands.
descriptions.es: A single kick from a Quaquaval can send a truck rolling. This Pokémon uses its powerful legs to perform striking dances from far-off lands.
descriptions.ca: Una sola puntada d'un Quaquaval pot fer rodar un camió. Aquest Pokémon utilitza les seves potes poderoses per realitzar vistoses danses de terres llunyanes.
